mapper.select: SELECT ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.lessonnum, ec.cover, et.`name` as teachername, es1.title as subjectlevelone, es2.title as subjectleveltwo FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et on ec.teacherid = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 on ec.subjectid = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 on ec.subjectid = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId} ;
